org.glassfish.admin.monitor.jvm

Class JVMThreadSystemStatsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.glassfish.admin.monitor.jvm.JVMThreadSystemStatsProvider

  • @AMXMetadata(type="thread-system-mon",
             group="monitoring")
@ManagedObject
@Description(value="JVM Thread System Statistics")
public class JVMThreadSystemStatsProvider
extends Object
